title: TypeError: Can't instantiate abstract class Estimator with abstract methods init_par
body:
For de.test.wald, if backend='tf1' the following error is thrown:

`TypeError: Can't instantiate abstract class Estimator with abstract methods init_par`

```
Using backend:  tf1
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/repo/sc_nextflow-ldev/pipelines/0035-differential_condition/bin/015-run_diffxpy.py", line 427, in <module>
    main()
  File "/repo/sc_nextflow-ldev/pipelines/0035-differential_condition/bin/015-run_diffxpy.py", line 304, in main
    noise_model='nb'
  File "/miniconda3/envs/diffxpy_tf1pt15pt3_v4/lib/python3.7/site-packages/diffxpy/testing/tests.py", line 736, in wald
    **kwargs,
  File "/miniconda3/envs/diffxpy_tf1pt15pt3_v4/lib/python3.7/site-packages/diffxpy/testing/tests.py", line 227, in _fit
    **constructor_args
TypeError: Can't instantiate abstract class Estimator with abstract methods init_par
```

Conda environment:
```
channels:
  - hanyucui
  - conda-forge
  - bioconda
  - r
  - defaults
dependencies:
  - pandas=1.0.5
  - scipy=1.5.0
  - scanpy=1.5.1
  - plotnine=0.7.0
  - scikit-learn=0.23.1
  - joblib=0.15.1
  - tensorflow-gpu=1.15.0+db2
  - pip
  - pip:
      - diffxpy==0.7.4
```
